ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Set of tools for reading and processing spatial data. The aim is to supply the workflow to create thematic maps. This package also facilitates 'tmap', the package for visualizing thematic maps.
Set of tools for reading and processing spatial data. The aim is to supply the workflow to create thematic maps. This package also facilitates 'tmap', the package for visualizing thematic maps.

name: r-tmaptools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.3" %} 
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tmaptools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/tmaptools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/tmaptools/tmaptools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cadb9918a463ca7e4f4d13f964f9fde25436958a56dd9ec6a2be5f609c804c56

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-xml
    - r-classint
    - r-dichromat
    - r-lwgeom >=0.1_4
    - r-magrittr
    - r-raster >=2.7_15
    - r-sf >=0.9
    - r-stars >=0.4_0
    - r-units >=0.6_1
    - r-viridislite
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-xml
    - r-classint
    - r-dichromat
    - r-lwgeom >=0.1_4
    - r-magrittr
    - r-raster >=2.7_15
    - r-sf >=0.9
    - r-stars >=0.4_0
    - r-units >=0.6_1
    - r-viridislite

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('tmaptools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('tmaptools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/mtennekes/tmaptools
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Set of tools for reading and processing spatial data. The aim is to supply the workflow to create thematic maps. This package also facilitates 'tmap', the package for visualizing thematic maps.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3
  doc_url: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/tmaptools/tmaptools.pdf
  dev_url: https://github.com/mtennekes/tmaptools

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - agcopenhaver
    - oblute
    - tata17

# Package: tmaptools
# Type: Package
# Title: Thematic Map Tools
# Version: 3.0
# Authors@R: person("Martijn", "Tennekes", email = "mtennekes@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: Set of tools for reading and processing spatial data. The aim is to supply the workflow to create thematic maps. This package also facilitates 'tmap', the package for visualizing thematic maps.
# License: GPL-3
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# Date: 2020-03-30
# Depends: R (>= 3.0), methods
# Imports: sf (>= 0.9), lwgeom (>= 0.1-4), stars (>= 0.4-0), units (>= 0.6-1), grid, raster (>= 2.7-15), classInt, KernSmooth, magrittr, RColorBrewer, viridisLite, stats, dichromat, XML
# Suggests: tmap (>= 2.2), rmapshaper, osmdata, OpenStreetMap, png, shiny, shinyjs
# URL: https://github.com/mtennekes/tmaptools
# BugReports: https://github.com/mtennekes/tmaptools/issues
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.0
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-03-30 14:17:44 UTC; mtes
# Author: Martijn Tennekes [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Martijn Tennekes <mtennekes@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-03-30 15:00:02 UTC
